resources.string: This device doesn\'t support Camera2 API.
Vision is now in currency detection mode. Long press the screen to open help.
Please hold a currency note to the camera.
Low light conditions. Please double tap to turn flash on
1. Long press the screen to open help from main screen. \n2. Long press the screen to open main screen from help.
1. Tap the screen once to start currency recognition. \n2. Double tap the screen to toggle the flash light.
